meh.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: used to show that you do not care about something or are not impressed by something
meh.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: I thought the album was just kind of meh.
meh.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: not caring or feeling excited about something
meh.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: I just feel so meh about everything.
